title: 3/23/17 - Full Show
description:
Homo Deus: A Brief History of Tomorrow ...Why there's real reason for hope in the future ...GOP to pass health care reform...or pass on health care reform???...Andy Andrews, author of the book "The Little Things" in studio ...Joel Rosenberg discusses the state of the world from ISIS to Russia to Turkey and why they matter NOW ...We're making progress on ISIS but... ...Time to get nervous about Russia?

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio

Facebook: Glenn BeckTwitter: @glennbeck
